creator: stefan.wachter@gmx.de
text: If a url is constructed using the c:url and c:param tags then resulting the resulting url is invalid. The problem is that the '&' character is not escaped by using &. The result is for example: test This is invalid XML because a parser expects the '&' character to start an entity. Yet &b... is not a valid entity.

creator: pierre.delisle@sun.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23319 ***
